\section*{Regular}
\lipsum[1]

\section*{Italic}
\textit{\lipsum[2]} 

\section*{Bold}
\textbf{\lipsum[3]}

\section*{Bold Italic}

\textbf{\textit{\lipsum[4]}}

\section*{Default Numbers}

1234567890

\section*{Oldstyle Numbers}

\section*{Lining Numbers}

\section*{Tabular Numbers}

\section*{Superior Numbers}
